      • Sections

Sections Settings

You can customize, add or hide Home page sections. Choose section you'd like to edit in the left sidebar.

Carousel#

You can enable/disable Carousel section.

Add Image#

Edit, add or remove images inside the carousel.

1. Select image#

Upload the image you'd like to display in the carousel.

2. Caption heading#

Type the title for the image (E.g., Ready to "supercharge" your car).

3. Caption heading size#

Choose the size of the title (H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6). (Learn more).

4. Caption content#

Type the subtitle if you need one. Leave empty to disable.

5. Button URL#

Select link to the page where you'd like to redirect store visitors. Leave the box empty to remove the button.

6. Button text#

Type the text you'd like to display on the button.

7. Button color#

Choose the button color from the options (white, light, dark, primary, secondary).

8. Button size#

Select the size of the button (small, normal, large).

Settings#

1. Background color#

Choose the background color from the options (white, light, dark, primary, secondary, carbon effect, gradient).

2. Background gradient#

Paste your CSS gradient code from sources like uiGradients.

Carousel#

You can manage the way Carousel is displayed.

1. Show Controls#

Enable or disable previous/next buttons.

2. Show Indicators#

Enable or disable small dots at the bottom of the carousel. These dots show the number of images in the carousel.

3. Autoplay time#

You can enable and set the autoplay time.

4. Transition effect#

Customize the way images switch. Select between options (fade or slide).

5. Transition speed#

Set the speed for images to switch inside the carousel.

Image#

1. Image aspect ratio#

Customize the image size. Recommended values are between '0.3' to '0.5'.

2. Image Minimum Height (px)#

You can set the image mimimum height. It is useful for a better mobile view.

Spacing#

Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes. Learn more.

Margin is the space between the elementsâ€™ borders. You can customize:

  1. Margin top
  2. Margin bottom

Year-Make-Model Bar#

To customize Year-Make-Model Bar, go to the left sidebar and choose "Select Your Vehicle" section.

Settings#

1. Background image#

Upload the background image you'd like to be displayed behind the Year-Make-Model bar.

2. Title#

Type the title to appeat above the Year-Make-Model bar. Industry standard is "Select Your Vehicle".

3. Subtitle#

Add subtitle with extra information.

4. Title size#

Customize the title size. Choose one of the options (H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6).

5. Title text color#

Choose the title text color from the options (white, dark, primary, secondary).

6. Subtitle text color#

Choose the subtitle text color from the options (white, dark, primary, secondary).

7. Center#

You can enable/disable the Year-Make-Model Bar positioning in the center. If disabled, the bar will stretch to the entire width of the page.

Spacing#

Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes Learn more)

Margin is the space between the elementsâ€™ borders. You can customize:

  1. Margin top
  2. Margin bottom

Shop by#

  1. Content

    1. Collection
    2. Brand

  2. Settings

    1. Wrap in container
    2. Show products counts in collections
    3. Image width (px)
    4. Image height (px)
    5. Collections per row / Mobile
    6. Collections per row / Table
    7. Collections per row / Desktop

  3. Spacing (Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes Learn more)

    1. Margin top
    2. Margin bottom

Top Categories#

  1. Collection

  2. Settings

    1. Title
    2. Subtitle
    3. Light background - changes background color from blue to grey
    4. Title alignment - left, center, right
    5. Wrap in container

  3. Carousel

    1. Show Controls - toggle prev/next buttons
    2. Show Indicators - toggle small dots at the bottom
    3. Autoplay time
    4. Transition effect - Learn more about Animate.css
    5. Transition speed

  4. Items

    1. Image width (px)
    2. Image height (px)
    3. Items per row / Mobile
    4. Items per row / Table
    5. Items per row / Desktop

  5. Spacing (Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes Learn more)

    1. Padding top
    2. Padding bottom
    3. Margin top
    4. Margin bottom

Banners#

  1. Banner

    1. Select image
    2. Image width (px)
    3. Image height (px)
    4. First title line
    5. Second title line
    6. First subtitle line
    7. Second subtitle line
    8. First title line text color
    9. Second title line text color
    10. First subtitle line text color
    11. Second subtitle line text color
    12. Button URL - select link to theme page or remove it (Leave empty to disable)
    13. Button text
    14. Button color - white, light, dark, primary, secondary

  2. Settings

    1. Wrap in container
    2. Banners per row / Mobile
    3. Banners per row / Table
    4. Banners per row / Desktop

  3. Spacing (Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes Learn more)

    1. Margin top
    2. Margin bottom

Testimonials#

  1. Testimonail

    1. Select product
    2. Title
    3. Description
    4. Date
    5. Customer name
    6. Customer description - ordered from
    7. Customer photo

  2. Settings

    1. Background color - white, light, dark, primary, secondary, carbon effect, gradient (set below)
    2. Background gradient - Paste your CSS gradient code from sources like [uiGradients] (https://uigradients.com/)
    3. Title
    4. Subtitle
    5. Title alignment - left, center, right
    6. Wrap in container

  3. Carousel

    1. Show Controls - toggle prev/next buttons
    2. Show Indicators - toggle small dots at the bottom
    3. Autoplay time
    4. Transition effect - Learn more about Animate.css
    5. Transition speed

  4. Image

    1. Customer photo circle
    2. Customer photo size (px)

  5. Spacing (Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes Learn more)

    1. Padding top
    2. Padding bottom
    3. Margin top
    4. Margin bottom

    4. Margin bottom

Blog section#

  1. Blog

  2. Settings

    1. Title
    2. Subtitle
    3. Light background - changes background color from blue to grey
    4. Title alignment - left, center, right
    5. Wrap in container

  3. Blog post list

    1. Image width (px)
    2. Image height (px)
    3. Show authors
    4. Show dates
    5. Show comments
    6. Show excerpts
    7. Excerpts length - The maximum number of characters for the post excerpt
    8. Show readmore button
    9. Products limit
    10. Posts per row / Mobile
    11. Posts per row / Table
    12. Posts per row / Desktop

    2. Padding bottom

    4. Margin bottom

Featured Product#

  1. Content (additional information)

  2. Settings

    1. Section Title
    2. Product
    3. Product title small font - Recommended if your product titles are long
    4. Show vendor
    5. Show quantity
    6. Show payment icons
    7. Show social sharing
    8. Show tags

  3. Image gallery

    1. Show Controls - toggle prev/next buttons
    2. Show Indicators - toggle small dots at the bottom
    3. Transition effect - Learn more about Animate.css
    4. Thumbnails per row

  4. Spacing (Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes Learn more)

    1. Margin top
    2. Margin bottom
